{"id":1138662883,"question_id":3239,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1704556828,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1138662883/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make X and Y Equal","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumOperationsToMakeEqual(int x, int y) {\n        // x / 11^a / 5^b y \n        \n        // System.out.println(x + \"　\"+ y);\n        \n        if(x==y) return 0;\n        if(x<y) return y-x;\n        \n        \n        int res= Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        \n        \n        if(Math.abs(x-y*5)<5)\n            return x-y*5;\n        \n        if(Math.abs(x-y*11)<5)\n            return x-y*11;\n            \n            \n        res = Math.min(res, 1+minimumOperationsToMakeEqual(x, y*5));\n        res = Math.min(res, 1+minimumOperationsToMakeEqual(x, y*11));\n     \n        return res;\n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-x-and-y-equal","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
